SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class StudentStartExamController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentStartExamController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class StudentStartExamController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The StudentStartExamController class manages the exam taking process for students. It handles loading exam data, navigating between questions, saving answers, and submitting the exam.

    A private inner class for managing countdown timer values.

      public void submit(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

      Parameters:
      e - The ActionEvent triggered by the submit button.

      Parameters:
      e - The ActionEvent triggered by the close action.

    • handleTimeUp

      public void handleTimeUp()
      Handles the event when the time for the exam runs out. Submit the exam automatically
